item.title: A Zulu - Kafir Dictionary
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: Zulu - Kafir Dictionary etymologically explained, with copious illustrations and examples, preceded by an introduction on the Zulu - Kafir language. By the Rev. J. L. Dohne, missionary to the American board C. F. M. Cape Town: Printed at G. J. Pike's Machine Printing office, 59, Sr. George's - Street, 1857.]
